trans-unit.source: Provides the base class used to support user property settings.
trans-unit.target: 提供用來支援使用者屬性設定的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Web Forms and Windows Forms both use the same configuration settings infrastructure to support user settings.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET Web Form 和 Windows Form 使用相同的組態設定基礎結構來支援使用者設定。

trans-unit.source: User settings within ASP.NET are often referred to as ASP.NET Profile.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 中的使用者設定通常稱為 ASP.NET 設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The settings infrastructure includes the SettingsBase base class, the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> class, the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue> class, the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsContext> class, the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider> class, and the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 設定基礎結構包括 SettingsBase 基底類別，<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty>類別，<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue>類別的<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsContext>類別、<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider>類別和<xref:System.Configuration.SettingAttribute>類別。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingAttribute> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsContext> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty>

trans-unit.source: The Settings base classes provide only a common infrastructure for defining and persisting settings properties.
trans-unit.target: 設定基底類別提供的通用基礎結構來定義和保存設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Depending on how these base classes are derived and their run-time environment, the settings API can provide different levels of functionality.
trans-unit.target: 根據這些基底類別衍生的方式和其執行階段環境，設定應用程式開發介面可以提供不同的功能等級。

trans-unit.source: For example, ASP.NET Profile uses the settings base classes to provide per-user settings that are saved and loaded according to request semantics.
trans-unit.target: 例如，ASP.NET 設定檔會使用設定基底類別，來提供所儲存及載入根據要求語意的每個使用者設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsBase"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the associated settings context.
trans-unit.target: 取得相關聯的設定內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsContext> is used by the application to provide contextual information that the provider can use to persist settings.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsContext>由應用程式用來提供內容提供者可用來保存設定的資訊。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsContext>

trans-unit.source: Each settings class derived from <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> has a context associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 每個設定類別衍生自<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>具有與其相關聯的內容</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>

trans-unit.source: The context is passed to the settings provider to identity additional information about the settings information.
trans-unit.target: 內容會傳遞給身分識別的其他資訊的設定資訊的設定提供者。

trans-unit.source: Context therefore acts as a hint to help the settings provider determine how to persist the associated settings values.
trans-unit.target: 內容因此作為提示，以協助判斷如何保存相關的設定值的設定提供者。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsContext"></xref> associated with the settings instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsContext"> </xref>設定執行個體相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Initializes internal properties used by <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化所用的內部屬性<xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsBase"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The settings context related to the settings properties.
trans-unit.target: 設定內容相關的設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: The settings properties that will be accessible from the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 設定屬性且可從<xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsBase"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The initialized providers that should be used when loading and saving property values.
trans-unit.target: 載入及儲存屬性值時，應使用初始化提供者。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the object is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出物件的存取是否為同步 （安全執行緒）。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsBase"></xref> is synchronized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果存取<xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsBase"></xref>已同步處理，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the specified settings property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定的設定屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The Item property, also known as the indexer, is routinely used in the settings class derived from <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>.
trans-unit.target: 項目屬性，也稱為索引子，而例行性用於衍生自<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>.</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>設定類別

trans-unit.source: The Item property binds the public property of the class to the corresponding settings property.
trans-unit.target: 此項目屬性類別的公用屬性繫結至對應的設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: The first time a property is accessed, the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> instance will find all other properties that share the same provider as the requested property.
trans-unit.target: 存取屬性時，第一次<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>執行個體將會尋找所有共用相同的提供者所要求的屬性為其他屬性。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> instance will then call the provider, passing it the set of <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> objects that represent the data the provider should retrieve.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>執行個體然後會呼叫提供者，並將其傳遞一組<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty>物件，代表提供者應該擷取的資料。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>

trans-unit.source: Note that the indexer will get and set property data in a thread-safe manner if <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.IsSynchronized%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，將會取得索引子，而且如果以執行緒安全的方式設定屬性資料<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.IsSynchronized%2A>是`true`。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.IsSynchronized%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> instance by default is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>預設執行個體不是安全執行緒。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>

trans-unit.source: However, you can call <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Synchronized%2A>, passing in a <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> instance to make the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> indexer operate in a thread-safe manner.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Synchronized%2A>，並傳入<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>執行個體進行<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>索引子以安全執行緒的方式運作。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Synchronized%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the property to access.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含用來存取屬性的名稱。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If found, the value of the named settings property.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到，具名的設定屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: There are no properties associated with the current object, or the specified property could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 沒有目前的物件，與相關聯的屬性，或找不到指定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定唯讀屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value supplied is of a type incompatible with the settings property, during a set operation.
trans-unit.target: 在設定作業期間設定屬性，與不相容的型別是所提供的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of settings properties.
trans-unit.target: 取得設定屬性的集合。

trans-unit.source: The `get` accessor of the Properties property returns the collection of <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> instances associated with the properties managed by the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> instance.
trans-unit.target: `get`內容屬性存取子傳回的集合<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty>所管理的屬性相關聯的執行個體<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>執行個體。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> class natively recognizes certain characteristics of a setting, such as its name, property type, settings provider, default value, and read-only status and a serialization preference.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>類別原生會辨識某些設定，例如其名稱、 屬性類型、 設定提供者、 預設值和唯讀狀態和序列化喜好設定的特性。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>

trans-unit.source: These characteristics are mirrored as properties in the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> class.
trans-unit.target: 這些特性會鏡射做為屬性<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty>類別。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty>

trans-unit.source: All other attributes of the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> class are just passed through to its associated settings provider as a <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsAttributeDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他屬性的<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty>類別都只會傳遞給<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsAttributeDictionary>.</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsAttributeDictionary>為其相關聯的設定提供者</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection"></xref> collection containing all the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection"> </xref>集合，其中包含所有<xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of settings property values.
trans-unit.target: 取得設定的集合屬性值。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue"></xref> objects representing the actual data values for the properties managed by the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue"></xref>代表受屬性的實際資料值物件<xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsBase"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of settings providers.
trans-unit.target: 取得設定提供者的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProviderCollection"></xref> containing <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProvider"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProviderCollection"> </xref>包含<xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProvider"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Stores the current values of the settings properties.
trans-unit.target: 儲存設定屬性的目前值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> instance groups properties based on the provider that is associated with each property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>執行個體根據每一個屬性相關聯的提供者的屬性予以分組。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>

trans-unit.source: Each provider is then called in sequence and is passed the set of properties that the provider should save.
trans-unit.target: 每個提供者稱為序列中，並傳遞的一組應該儲存提供者的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsBase"></xref> class that is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsBase"></xref>類別，為同步 （安全執行緒）。

trans-unit.source: The indexer will get and set property data in a thread-safe manner if the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.IsSynchronized%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 索引子將會取得並以執行緒安全的方式設定屬性的資料，如果<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.IsSynchronized%2A>屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.IsSynchronized%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> instance by default is not thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>預設的執行個體不是安全執行緒。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>

trans-unit.source: However, you can call Synchronized passing in a <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> instance to make the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> indexer operate in a thread-safe manner.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以呼叫已同步處理傳入<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>執行個體進行<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>索引子以安全執行緒的方式運作。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>

trans-unit.source: The class used to support user property settings.
trans-unit.target: 用來支援使用者屬性設定的類別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsBase"></xref> class that is synchronized.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsBase"> </xref>同步處理的類別。
